description: Change Idc0dfbbe1887e11166acb7d989dd5466751761af removed get_all method from mc and db drivers, and made this method private in zk driver. Now no one of servicegroup drivers (mc, db, zk) doesn't implement method get_all. And it's very confusing. This method used nowhere so it should be removed.
title: Method 'get_all' from servicegroup API doesn't implemented in drivers

comments.content: Change Idc0dfbbe1887e11166acb7d989dd5466751761af removed get_all method from mc and db drivers, and made this method private in zk driver. Now no one of servicegroup drivers (mc, db, zk) doesn't implement method get_all. And it's very confusing. This method used nowhere so it should be removed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~snikitin

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/214629
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=eb285ee07b690189808b4c4df7b1913ffb37101b
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit eb285ee07b690189808b4c4df7b1913ffb37101b
Author: Sergey Nikitin <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Aug 19 17:08:00 2015 +0300

    Remove get_all method from servicegroup API
    
    Change Idc0dfbbe1887e11166acb7d989dd5466751761af removed
    get_all method from mc and db drivers, and made this
    method private in zk driver.
    
    Now no one of servicegroup drivers (mc, db, zk) doesn't
    implement method get_all. And it's very confusing.
    
    This method used nowhere so it should be removed.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1502107
    
    Change-Id: Ie56d15f61aa61e3bd05c77eab52c65d557de5d8b
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
